resources.string: At the start of the game, you own the tiles on the bottom row. Your opponent owns the top row.
Make words by connecting tiles. The first letter of the word must be from a tile that you own.
After playing, you own any unowned tiles in the word. Opponent\'s tiles become unowned.
If you own all tiles next to a tile you own, it will be \"super owned\" (darker in color).
You can only play into your opponent\'s super owned tiles if the word starts in one of your super owned tiles.
If you can\'t play a word you can select \"Pass turn\" from the game menu.
Your score is equal to the number of tiles you own.
You win when your score reaches the \"score to win\", which ticks down by one after each turn.
Click \"Game rules\" in the menu to come back to this tutorial.
